1.ara-name: كتاب الطهارة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that :the Prophet said: "Wash the vessel the dog has drunk from seven times: the first or the last of them with dirt. And when the cat drinks out of it, wash it once

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي سُؤْرِ الْكَلْبِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Leftover Water A Dog Has Drank From
